section.name: Installation Instructions
section.p: The basic install medium is a war file called applications-integration.war, which can be found at
The war requires Tomcat 4.1.24 or higher running under JVM 1.4 or higher

To do the inital install of the application it needs simply to be added into $TOMCAT_HOME/webapps directory and start tomcat. This will install the basic files required to run the service along with some example configuration files as well as a test application.
At this point you can obtain more information by looking at the web site itself
where detailed explanations of the confuration steps are contained. In summary you need to

ol.li: configure a database to store the management information that the application controller needs.

configure two JNDI resources in tomcat
jdbc/AstrogridACDatasource that points to the database created in step 1
AstrogridApplicationsConfigURL is a URL that points to a file that contains the main configuration data for the application controller including another pointer to a file that describes the actual applications that the controller manages.
